lenders.name: Les
lenders.loan_because: what you do for the least of these you do to me...God commands

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I believe if we all share our resources, everyone can have a quality life.  Finding practical ways to make a difference in the world isn't easy.  But Kiva is one of those ways.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the process of a mid-life career and life change.  Life is good and I am learning to live in new and exciting ways.  My goal is to "Awake! Awake! To love and work" each and every day.  My prayer is that I will be able to do that more and more.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: We are all interconnected. Sometimes we can offer help, sometimes we need help. When we all work together the world becomes a better place.

lenders.name: UPTHOUGHT
lenders.occupational_info:
UPTHOUGHT specializes in simple and powerful web development that does not cost a fortune.  

Our team works remotely and can be found in Boston, Oregon, and Montreal, and makes it a point to keep overhead low, costs down, and our footprint small.  

We are honored to be able to support growing businesses like ours throughout the world.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: All people need access to capital to support their communities and themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach doctors how to use nutrition and herbal medicine with their patients.

lenders.name: Alexa
lenders.loan_because: I believe in  paying it forward
lenders.occupational_info: I help people communicate

lenders.occupational_info: aerotaxi

lenders.name: Salifu Ablie
lenders.loan_because: I'm a student at the university and I acme from a financially poor background but I have a lot of plans to do small scale ventures in order to make profit and  as well help me and my community from attain some amount of economic independence. I tried to contact different banks in my region but all that they say is that I do not have the collateral for their loans and so I do not QUALIFY..... Personally I believe that I can do it if I'm given the chance to have the startups fulfilled up to the level where I can find local financing
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm currently involved in leading long term projects of the Industries For Africa Foundation and I'm currently the leader of the small scale Glass Manufacturing Plant and the Cotton/Distributed Power Generation projects in the Gambia.
I also do other private jobs to help make ends meet and this I will upon request give details about if anyone is interested

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: I can. It's painless, and I can see the progress people are making with the money I've loaned.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.occupation: Student of Development / Former Kiva Fellow
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have the opportunity to take care of their family and make their community a place that they want to live.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm learning about community-led poverty alleviation from an African perspective. I had the opportunity to work as a KF8 Kiva Fellow at K-MET in Kisumu, Kenya.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: My life is about making a difference in various ways- this is one small way I can do that.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer and speaker.

lenders.name: vero l olivera
lenders.loan_because: this is an amazing opportunity to connect with other humanists.  I feel grateful & inspired by the business owners & lenders in the Kiva community :-P
lenders.occupational_info: In my work, I help individuals and business owners with their protection, growth, and retirement needs.

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone should have an opportunity to make their life better .
lenders.occupational_info: I work with foster kids (kids who were taken away from their parents by the state due to abuse or neglect) and help them find permanent people to be in their life.

lenders.name: Sigrid
lenders.loan_because: I got the account as a christmas present from my wonderful brother.

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: I am committed that Americans resurrect our image in the world. Doing things that are positive, generous and good.  Loaning with Kiva is just a small step in the right direction.
lenders.occupational_info: I help customers install and configure software that helps large organizations be more effective.

lenders.name: Polaris
lenders.occupation: Land Steward/ Visual Artist/ Dj/ Promoter/ Human

lenders.name: Beau

lenders.occupational_info: We investigate and expose Internet scams and other practices harmful to people.

lenders.name: Kay P
lenders.loan_because: it evens things up just a little bit.

lenders.name: Angela

It is great to help people who want to help themselves because good citizens making contributions to their societies is what every town needs to be strong and healthy.

lenders.loan_because: It's an obligation to help others achieve prosperity!

lenders.occupational_info: I love the opportunity to pay it forward... will you join me?

lenders.loan_because: Our children are learning that one less toy means another person is one step closer to obtaining the means to help themselves.

lenders.loan_because: to give a helping hand to less fortunate but resourceful people so they can help themselves and others too.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of a better more simple way to truly help and encourage global growth and stability. The lasting effect and the potential created from a Kiva loan is priceless. The best part - you can have the same $100 work over and over again for the cause.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I would like to give back to the people in some the countries I've been fortunate enough to travel to & hope to see in the future. Because they have given me so much in life experiences.
lenders.occupational_info: I work behind the camera. In the technical field. Basically, I watch TV all day, I just don't get to change the channel.

lenders.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs raise funds to start their business.

lenders.loan_because: even my small donation can make a big difference.

lenders.name: Passion
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: Heaslip Family
lenders.loan_because: Becuase we are fortunate enough to be able.

lenders.name: jason
lenders.loan_because: I like to see other people "having a go" to better their lives.

lenders.name: Kaye, Mark, Matt & Ben
lenders.loan_because:
It is our social responsibility to help those with less in the world. This is a great way to help at a grass roots level. It is nice to see the faces of those that we are able to help in a small way.
We want our children to grow up and think of the whole planet as one home and one family.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I've long been interested in micro-finance and was excited to find I could actually participate in it! The idea appeals to me so much more than a donation as lending allows the same money to help again and again, while also preserving the recipients' dignity and self-respect.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a local farmers market and I build websites with Wordpress.

lenders.occupational_info: I work in broadcasting media as gate keeper. this job help people in public service.n i want to have side job to sell thing in fashions, such as clothing.

lenders.name: Sachiko
lenders.loan_because: It is important for  people to have the choices.

lenders.name: TPK
lenders.loan_because: I am doing well in life and I want the rest of the world to do well too. I believe everyone should give and that is the way to solve the ills of today.

lenders.name: Birgit
lenders.loan_because: It is worth sharing some of my money with less privileged people. Also I like that they have ideas and an ambition and I feel giving them a loan rather than a donation is more respectful and trustful.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a team of Software Developers in a large worldwide IT company. I am located in Germany.

lenders.loan_because: we are all belonging together

I design together with nice people from Czech republic textiles for 
seats in cars

lenders.occupational_info: I am a business lawyer

lenders.occupational_info:
I create art .  
While this is my love ...  helping homeless dogs is  my passion.

lenders.loan_because:
Hello! 
His business, I do not want to open yet. 
I am a normal girl with average wealth, so I need finance for the children.
But I do with children. We have many children in Ukraine who have no relatives. My dream-to help these children settle in life. 
I believe the girl. 
I need sponsors that have helped me to reorganize the children's home. I need your help.

lenders.name: Aine
lenders.loan_because: it's great to be able to support women and families trying to improve their lives
lenders.occupational_info: I look after and care for women and their families throughout pregnancy, childbirth and early parenthood

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: To give back and serve the lord.  It is something my mom and I can do together.

lenders.name: Graciela
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is the best way to help others help themselves. Much better than giving money because when people achieve things for themselves, they feel proud, satisfied and more motivated to continue. They also acquire greater self-confidence.
lenders.occupational_info: I tutor students with their school English and French. Also teach English to adults who want to either learn the language from 0 or improve it.

lenders.name: Dorte
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a very good way to help
lenders.occupational_info: I am a volunteer in Nepal. Helping the very poor to be able to take a loan later.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because:
Bill Clinton's book "Giving" spoke about Kiva and I knew immediately that I wanted to be involved with this. 

I like the proverb "Show a man and he'll teach no-one. Show a woman and she'll teach the village." Another proverb I like is "Money is like manure. You've got to spread it around to let small things grow."

The idea of being a like a small bank is such a wonderful idea! To be directly contributing to people growing their businesses in places that are tiny specks on a map is just an awesome concept!
lenders.occupational_info:
I work as a website developer in the government sector. My organisation serves an area with a population of over 100,000 people, providing services from children's health, youth services, aged care, health, events,  infrastructure and more.

The website I develop helps people learn about our activities and how we can help them in their lives.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it is important to act on both the micro and macro levels. I lend to improve the situation for an individual/community AND I agitate with my government for an improvement based in their foreign affairs policies.
lenders.occupational_info: I am primarily a weaver of tapestry and cloth. I also make jewellry using a lacemaking technique.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I simply want to help others and provide them with opportunities, and doing it this way just feels right!

lenders.name: Quench Bath & Body
lenders.loan_because: This is a way to help people to help themselves.  Also, being a small business owner, I know how it can end up being a viscious cycle when you can't grow your business unless you have X, which you cannot get until you have the money to buy Y.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a bath and body products company that specializes in traditional beauty rituals from around the world.  We find these products, and then buy either the finished products or the ingredients needed from the country of origin, ideally from a coop, or a small busines owner in the country, and make the product available to consumers here in the US.

lenders.name: Sunny
lenders.loan_because: My owners gave me a second chance and I believe it is important to pay it forward!

lenders.name: Katharine
lenders.loan_because: I love.

lenders.name: JAN
lenders.loan_because: It can change people's  lives and fulfill their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Design & photography

lenders.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org Regular Fund
lenders.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) engages in poverty alleviating projects. Our major project is to provide microloans through the Kiva platform. You can help support P2P by joining our lending team here: http://www.kiva.org/team/poverty2prosperity
lenders.occupational_info: This is the P2P "Regular Fund". While many of our funds are targeted at specific poverty relief areas such as loans to women entrepreneurs, education & tuition fees, youth, and public housing, this fund is a general fund that makes loans to just about all sectors. Please see our site for more details on all the different funds we manage.

lenders.name: Simone
lenders.loan_because:
I was lucky in my life... it wasn't hard to get money i have, so i can give them to someone.
Second reason is that i love people trying to do business with few money.
lenders.occupational_info: I started building websites... now i have some websites that give me revenue

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I'm riding round the world on an old motorcycle and I enjoy helping people.
lenders.occupational_info: I don't have much money myself and I enjoy people pulling themselves up by their bootstraps.

lenders.name: rick
lenders.loan_because: We're all in this together.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help other single mothers achieve their dreams

lenders.name: anjachristina
lenders.loan_because: A small amount of money for me can make a little difference in the life of someone else. If I can help someone start a business or earn a living better with this loan, I´m happy to do it!
lenders.occupational_info: I am working in the engine development of a german car manufacturer.

lenders.name: michelle natividad
lenders.loan_because: its a way to extend GODS helping hands. its my lil way of paying it forward.

lenders.loan_because: I try to fight poverty and misery through Nonviolent Radical Party ( http://www.radicalparty.org )

lenders.name: Tim

Sarah works for a church getting the members active in volunteer work locally, nationally & internationally - she helps people help people.

lenders.name: Isaac
lenders.loan_because: Those of us that are lucky enough to live in a land with lots of wealth and opportunities should try to help those in other countries that don't have the same benefits.
lenders.occupational_info: I am pursuing a master's degree in occupational therapy.

lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Kerstin

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by the individuals' stories -- especially the women. And I want to help eliminate poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a foundation that makes grants & scholarships in the greater Seattle, Washington (USA) area.

lenders.name: Bert
lenders.loan_because: It's just a small effort to loan as little as $25; it's a small effort to improve someone's life.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: its a direct way to help people realize their dreams for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with university students helping them to develop and implement capacity building projects with communities around the world.

lenders.name: Samara
lenders.loan_because: Social justice can't wait.
lenders.occupational_info: I help remove barriers to reproductive health care for low income women, women of color, women in rural areas, and immigrant women in California.

lenders.name: Sydney

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance changes lives!
lenders.occupational_info: Global Poverty Research

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I can help people in a very real way in a different part of the world.

lenders.name: djovida
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my lifetime and now is the time to help someone else with their fortune.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a broadcast engineer.  I spend my time at work trying to keep everything running smoothly

lenders.name: Peace Lutheran Church
lenders.occupation: MORE discussion group from Peace Lutheran Church

lenders.name: Maxim G
lenders.loan_because: I feel the urge to help the country of my birth, one of the poorest countries in the world.

lenders.name: Mabel
lenders.loan_because: I think the whole concept of Kiva encouraging people to reach across the world to connect with one another is truly an inspired idea.   That, and the fact that I get to see this picture of me with my beautiful new little godsonpup, Fella, every time I make a loan makes lending here particularly sweet.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm retired as a teacher but I love being with children so I still substitute at the inner-city elementary school near me where I used to teach full time.  I also teach piano and Sunday School.

lenders.name: Basaran Family
lenders.loan_because:
We have 2 beautiful children adopted from Peru.  I was blessed to be able to travel the country extensively in 2004, and experienced the warmth and dedication of the people trying to make a better life for their children.  We also saw a huge improvement in the daily lives of the people, having witnessed personally hyper-inflation and the Shining Path days in 1989.  

We are proud to give back to honour our children and their heritage.  The photo shows my daughter Maritza and I on a reed boat in Lake Titicaca in 2004.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: We are all people sharing the same planet and we should help each other to have happy and useful lives. I live in a country where we have everything we need but a lot do not so I want to share what I have to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I live in a rural area and my husband is self employed. I do the books and also work full time for a large company.

lenders.name: Hannah
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a college student studying Sustainability and Russian Studies.

lenders.name: laura
lenders.loan_because: it's time for me to give back to the global community.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I hope to promote peace by helping energetic people prosper..
lenders.occupational_info: My wife and I own a small plumbing business.  We help ensure our community has safe, clean water.

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: Life is too valuable to be restricted because of what you've started with.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on computers to either fix them when they break or make them work better for people in my community.

lenders.name: Howard
lenders.loan_because: Others deserve to have some of the same opportunities I had to fulfill my dreams of raising a happy, healthy family
lenders.occupational_info: I am a practicing Orthopedic Surgeon

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: It's so very cool to do good.
lenders.occupational_info: Studying to work as a developer of sustainable communities.

lenders.name: Lyndsay
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: My aunt started me with a gift donation... and I'm so glad she did - I had heard about this site months ago and it slipped my mind! While I don't have a lot of excess money, I think it's important to do unto others the way I'd like to be treated. You know, the golden rule.

lenders.name: Gareth
lenders.loan_because: I can and I've been loaned money.

lenders.name: MaBiJaRi
lenders.loan_because: We believe in helping as many people live the life they dream of.  We have been lucky enough to be able to live our life the way we want it to be.
